article_title: Update: Fugitive arrested in Chaska had extensive criminal history
article_text:

og.description: Editor's note: This story has been updated regarding criminal charges against Micah Boyle that date back to 2002. Court records indicate he was convicted of a first-degree arson charge in Redwood County.
